eventDecorators.name: Recovered
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a erc20 token is recovered.

eventDecorators.name: RewardAdded
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a reward is added.

eventDecorators.name: RewardPaid
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when reward is paid to a user.

eventDecorators.name: RewardsDurationUpdated
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when the rewards duration is updated.

eventDecorators.name: Staked
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when tokens are staked to earn rewards.

eventDecorators.name: Withdrawn
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount of staked tokens from specific user.

functionDecorators.name: claimVest
functionDecorators.description: Claims all vesting amount.

functionDecorators.name: earned
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount of reward tokens a user has earned.

functionDecorators.name: exit
functionDecorators.description: Removes all stake and transfers all rewards to the staker.

functionDecorators.name: getReward
functionDecorators.description: Transfers to the caller the current amount of rewards tokens earned. updates rewards on callfrom the total reward a vestingRatio amount is locked into vesting and the rest is transferedif vesting period has passed transfer all rewards.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleMember
functionDecorators.description: Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleMemberCount
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role.

functionDecorators.name: grantRole
functionDecorators.description: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

functionDecorators.name: hasRole
functionDecorators.description: Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`.

functionDecorators.name: lastTimeRewardApplicable
functionDecorators.description: Returns the minimun between current block timestamp or the finish period of rewards.

functionDecorators.name: lastUpdateTime
functionDecorators.description: Last time rewards were updated.

functionDecorators.name: min
functionDecorators.description: Returns the minimun between two variables.

functionDecorators.name: notifyRewardAmount
functionDecorators.description: Notifies the contract that reward has been added to be given. Only owner can call itIncreases duration of rewards.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: periodFinish
functionDecorators.description: Tracks the period where users stop earning rewards.

functionDecorators.name: recoverERC20
functionDecorators.description: Added to support recovering LP Rewards from other systems such as BAL to be distributed to holders. Only owner can call it.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

functionDecorators.name: revokeRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

functionDecorators.name: rewardPerToken
functionDecorators.description: Returns the calculated reward per token deposited.

functionDecorators.name: rewardPerTokenStored
functionDecorators.description: Amount of reward calculated per token stored.

functionDecorators.name: rewards
functionDecorators.description: Tracks the user rewards.

functionDecorators.name: rewardsDuration
functionDecorators.description: How long the rewards lasts, it updates when more rewards are added.

functionDecorators.name: rewardsToken
functionDecorators.description: Address of the reward token (aVIX Token).

functionDecorators.name: setRewardsDuration
functionDecorators.description: Updates the reward duration. Only owner can call itPrevious rewards must be complete.

functionDecorators.name: stake
functionDecorators.description: Transfer staking token to contract. updates rewards on call.

functionDecorators.name: stakingToken
functionDecorators.description: Address of the staking token.

functionDecorators.name: totalSupply
functionDecorators.description: Returns the total amount of staked tokens.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: userRewardPerTokenPaid
functionDecorators.description: Track the rewards paid to users.

functionDecorators.name: vestingAmounts
functionDecorators.description: tracks vesting amount per user.

functionDecorators.name: vestingEnd
functionDecorators.description: Time where vesting ends.

functionDecorators.name: vestingRatio
functionDecorators.description: Vesting ratio.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Remove staking token and transfer back to staker. updates rewards on call.
